innerHTML:
Let’s face it, what use is a website if you can’t update it? Without a content management system that can be difficult. I have extensive knowledge of PHP and particularly WordPress theme development. I’m also very proficient in other HTML template languages.

While I’m not a back-end programmer, I’m happy to deliver an all-in-one solution or work with other agencies to develop a website. Let’s talk requirements.

Featured case study

  • Introducing Tales

I also do…

  • Responsive website design
  • HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development
  • Process and strategy
pageTitle: WordPress & CMS – David Bushell – Web Design (UK)
